name: detect_objects
description:
Detects objects in an image based on a list of text prompts, calculates their centroids, and optionally saves the coordinates to a file.

Output: A list of (x, y) coordinates for the centroids of all detected objects, with the type `List[Tuple[int, int]]`.

Example: `detection.detect_objects(img_path='my_image.png', prompt_list=['robot', 'obstacle'], save_path='centroids.txt')`

prompt_list.description: A list of text prompts to identify objects for detection.

img_path.description: Path to the input image file.

save_path.description: Optional file path to save the detected centroid coordinates.
